required_parameters.start_date: String (yyyy-mm-dd); Date range for weather data
required_parameters.end_date: String (yyyy-mm-dd); Date range for weather data

hourly_parameters.precipitation: Preceding hour sum, mm (inch); Total precipitation
hourly_parameters.rain: Preceding hour sum, mm (inch); Liquid precipitation
hourly_parameters.snowfall: Preceding hour sum, cm (inch); Snowfall amount
hourly_parameters.wind_speed_10m: Instant, km/h (mph, m/s, kn); Wind speed at 10 meters
hourly_parameters.soil_moisture_0_to_7cm: Instant, m³/m³; Soil moisture at 0-7 cm depth
hourly_parameters.et0_fao_evapotranspiration: Preceding hour sum, mm (inch); Reference Evapotranspiration

daily_parameters.weather_code: WMO code; Most severe weather condition
daily_parameters.wind_speed_10m_max: km/h (mph, m/s, kn); Max wind speed

required_parameters.start_date: String (yyyy-mm-dd); Date range for weather data
required_parameters.end_date: String (yyyy-mm-dd); Date range for weather data

hourly_parameters.pm10: Instant, µg/m³; Particulate matter with diameter smaller than 10 µm
hourly_parameters.pm2_5: Instant, µg/m³; Particulate matter with diameter smaller than 2.5 µm
hourly_parameters.carbon_monoxide: Instant, µg/m³; Carbon monoxide concentration near surface
hourly_parameters.nitrogen_dioxide: Instant, µg/m³; Nitrogen dioxide concentration near surface
hourly_parameters.sulphur_dioxide: Instant, µg/m³; Sulphur dioxide concentration near surface
hourly_parameters.ozone: Instant, µg/m³; Ozone concentration near surface
hourly_parameters.carbon_dioxide: Instant, ppm; Carbon dioxide concentration near surface
hourly_parameters.ammonia: Instant, µg/m³; Ammonia concentration (only available in Europe)
hourly_parameters.aerosol_optical_depth: Instant, Dimensionless; Aerosol optical depth at 550 nm
hourly_parameters.methane: Instant, µg/m³; Methane concentration near surface
hourly_parameters.dust: Instant, µg/m³; Saharan dust concentration near surface
hourly_parameters.uv_index: Instant, Index; UV index considering clouds
hourly_parameters.uv_index_clear_sky: Instant, Index; UV index under clear sky conditions
hourly_parameters.alder_pollen: Instant, Grains/m³; Alder pollen concentration (Europe only)
hourly_parameters.birch_pollen: Instant, Grains/m³; Birch pollen concentration (Europe only)
hourly_parameters.grass_pollen: Instant, Grains/m³; Grass pollen concentration (Europe only)
hourly_parameters.mugwort_pollen: Instant, Grains/m³; Mugwort pollen concentration (Europe only)
hourly_parameters.olive_pollen: Instant, Grains/m³; Olive pollen concentration (Europe only)
hourly_parameters.ragweed_pollen: Instant, Grains/m³; Ragweed pollen concentration (Europe only)
hourly_parameters.european_aqi: Instant, Index; European Air Quality Index
hourly_parameters.us_aqi: Instant, Index; United States Air Quality Index

daily_parameters.wind_speed_max: km/h (mph, m/s, kn); Maximum wind speed
